column4: Are the web forums down for maintenance or something? I time out when trying to get to http://www.ubuntuforums.org/
so bad web forums is... not uncommon. I'm guessing that no one can say when they'll be up again?
tks, yigal-epw... I'll check back in a day or two.
yigal-epw , any idea of what happened to the forums?
